summary: I wanted to make almost every item craftable and enchantable. So here you go. Keep in mind all the artifacts and unique items are less powerful, unenchanted replicas. If you want the real artifact or whatever you still have to do the quest to get it.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to make almost every item craftable and enchantable. So here you go. Keep in mind all the artifacts and unique items are less powerful, unenchanted replicas. If you want the real artifact or whatever you still have to do the quest to get it. 

NEW WEAPON RECIPES: 
*Pickaxe (Iron) 
*Woodcutters Axe (Iron) 
*Fork (Iron) 
*Knife (Iron) 
*Shiv (Iron) 
*Iron Bow (Iron) 
*Steel Bow (Steel) 
*Skyforge Steel Weapons (Skyforge) 
*Blade of Woe (Ebony) 
*Dragon Priest Dagger (Skyforge) 
*Silver Weapons (Steel) 
*Keening (Dwarven) 
*Ebony Katana (Ebony) 
*Ebony Blade (Ebony) 
*Chillrend (Glass) 
*Forsworn Weapons (Hide) 
*Ghostblade (Skyforge) 
*Ghostbow (Skyforge) 
*Ghostaxe (Skyforge) 
*Imperial Weapons (Steel) 
*Nightingale Blade (Ebony) 
*Nightingale Bow (Ebony) 
*Scimitar (Steel) 
*Headsman\'s Axe (Steel) 
*Wuuthrad (Skyforge) 

NEW ARMOR RECIPES: 
*Circlets (Jewelry) 
*Dragon Priest Masks 
*Brawlers Gloves (Steel) 
*The Stormcloak Set (Leather) 
*Scaled Horn Armor (Scaled) 
*The Blades Set (Ebony) 
*Jagged Crown (Dragon Bone) 
*Ebony Mail (Ebony) 
*Savior\'s Hide (Hide) 
*Shield of Ysgramor (Skyforge) 
*Spellbreaker (Dwarven) 
*Spiked Shield (Steel) 
*Thieves Guild Set (Leather) 
*Dark Brotherhood Set (Leather) 
*The Companions Set (Steel) 
*The Nightingale Set (Leather) 
*Imperial Generals Armor (Imperial) 
*Penitus Oculatus Armor (Imperial) 
*Full Imperial Helm (Imperial) 
*Imperial Officer\'s helm (Imperial) 
*Tsuns Armor (Leather) 
*Helm of Yngol (Steel Plate) 
*Executioner\'s Set (Leather) 

NEW RING AND AMULET RECIPES: 
*Ancient Nord Amulet (Skyforge) 
*Ring of Hircine (Daedric) 
*Ring of Namira (Daedric) 
*Amulet of the Elder Council 
*Necromancer Amulet 
*Amulet of Talos 
*Amulet of Akatosh 
*Amulet of Dibella 
*Amulet of Julianos 
*Amulet of Kynareth 
*Amulet of Mara 
*Amulet of Stendarr 
*Amulet of Zenithar 
*Amulet of Articulation 

MISC RECIPES: 
*Torches 
*Forsworn Arrows 
*4 leather strips create 1 piece of leather. (Tanning Rack) 
*3 gems of the same type create 1 flawless gem of that type. (Forge) 
*1 goat hide creates 1 piece of leather. (Tanning Rack) 
*1 deer pelt creates 2 pieces of leather. (Tanning Rack) 
*1 gold ingot creates 100 gold pieces. (Forge) 
*1 steel ingot creates 10 lockpicks. (Forge) 

OTHER CHANGES: 
*You can fast travel to the Skyforge now. (once you discover it) 
*Studded armor is in the hide catagory now. 
*Scaled Horn Armor is temperable now. 
*Skyforge Steel Dagger is temperable now. 
*Imperial Gauntlets are in the Imperial crafting category now. 
*Fixed the silent moons enchant. (just because I wanted to) 
*The Fork and Knife are now temperable. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dawnguard smithing 2.0

NEW WEAPON RECIPES: 
*Mace of Molag Bal (Daedric) 
*Mehrunes\' Razor (Daedric) 
*The Rueful Axe (Daedric) 
*Volendrung (Daedric) 
*Auriel\'s Bow (Elven) 
*Dawnbreaker (Daedric) 
*Dawnguard Rune Axe (Dawnguard) 
*Dawnguard Rune Hammer (Dawnguard) 
*Falmer War Axe (Falmer) 
*Falmer Sword (Falmer) 
*Falmer Bow (Falmer) 

NEW ARMOR RECIPES: 
*Masque of Clavicus Vile (Daedric) 
*Auriel\'s Shield (Elven) 
*Aetherial Crown (Jewelery/Dwarven) 
*Aetherial Shield (Dwarven) 
*Dawnguard Rune Shield (Dawnguard) 
*Dawnguard Heavy Set (Dawnguard) 
*Dawnguard Armor Set (Dawnguard) 
*Vampire Armor Set (Dawnguard) 
*Falmer Hardened Set (Falmer) 
*Falmer Set (Falmer) 
*Ancient Falmer Set (Falmer) 

NEW RING AND AMULET RECIPES: 
*Bone Hawk Ring 
*Gold Vampire Amulet 
*Moonstone Vampire Amulet 
*Copper Vampire Amulet 
*Quicksilver Vampire Amulet 
*Gold Vampire Ring 
*Moonstone Vampire Ring 
*Copper Vampire Ring 
*Quicksilver Vampire Ring 

MISC RECIPES: 
*Falmer Arrows 
*3 Ebony Ingots and 1 Daedra Heart create 3 Daedric Ingots. (Smelter) 
*1 Human Heart creates 3 Blood Potion (Cookpot) 
*1 Human Flesh creates 2 Blood Potions (Cookpot) 

OTHER CHANGES: 
*Created a Dawnguard Crafting category for the forge. 
*Daedric items now require Daedric Ingots rather than Daedra Hearts. 
*The Shellbug Helm is in the Falmer category now. 
*Bolts and Crossbows can be crafted at any forge now. 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dragonborn Smithing 2.0

NEW WEAPON RECIPES: 
*Ash Spawn Battle Axe (Steel) 
*Ash Spawn War Axe (Steel) 
*Bloodskal Blade (Steel) 
*Miraak\'s Sword (Daedric) 
*Champion\'s Cudgel (Steel) 

NEW ARMOR RECIPES: 
*Miraak\'s Set (Daedric) 
*The Skall Set (HIde) 
*Cultist Set (Leather) 
*Telvanni Robes (Leather) 

NEW RING AND AMULET RECIPES: 
*East Empire Company Amulet 
*Skaal Amulet 

MISC RECIPES: 
*Riekling Spears

author: Buckles
